title: Johnny's Adventure Makes Reading Fun
description: Do you know a child who doesn't like to read? After hearing, "I don't like to read," many times, I wrote "Johnny's Adventure Makes Reading Fun." It is geared toward children ages 4-8 who don't like to read, have reading difficulties or disabilities, or other obstacles to reading. Yet, all children will like the adventurous storyline of "Johnny's Adventure Makes Reading Fun" which captures the feelings to which any child can relate. Who doesn't like to have fun with a parent and feel comforted? See how Johnny's adventure makes reading fun for him.
author: Jodi Desautels
